An abstract base mapper class that provides utility methods for converting between internal cursor-based pagination objects and external REST API pagination DTOs.

## Key Components

- **`toRestPageInfo(CursorPageInfo)`** - Converts internal cursor page information to external REST format
- **`toCursorPaginationCriteria(PaginationCriteria)`** - Transforms external pagination criteria to internal cursor-based criteria

## Usage Example

```java
public class ProductRestMapper extends BaseRestMapper {
    
    public ProductListResponse mapToRestResponse(ProductPage productPage) {
        PageInfo restPageInfo = toRestPageInfo(productPage.getPageInfo());
        
        return ProductListResponse.builder()
                .products(mapProducts(productPage.getProducts()))
                .pageInfo(restPageInfo)
                .build();
    }
    
    public ProductPage fetchProducts(PaginationCriteria restCriteria) {
        CursorPaginationCriteria internalCriteria = 
            toCursorPaginationCriteria(restCriteria);
        
        return productService.findProducts(internalCriteria);
    }
}
```

This mapper handles the common pattern of translating between cursor-based pagination used internally and the pagination format exposed through REST APIs, with null-safe conversions and builder pattern usage.
